description: This roast leg of lamb is coated in sumac, oregano and garlic and slow-cooked to perfection. Serve with roast veg for a delicious Sunday lunch dish.
keywords: Roast lamb,Eggplant,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Easter,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Roast Lamb With Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 large carrots, peeled, cut into large chunks
2 tbs olive oil (save 1 tbs for drizzling)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190°C. Combine garlic, sumac, oregano and oil in a small bowl. Using a sharp knife, make small slits over the surface of the lamb. Season with salt and pepper. Spread paste over lamb and rub in well. Place lamb onto a rack in a roasting pan. Bake for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine vegetables in a separate roasting pan. Drizzle with oil and season with salt and pepper. Toss well to coat. Reduce oven temperature to 180°C.
Place the pan of vegetables into oven and cook, turning every 15 minutes, with the lamb for a further 45 minutes, or until golden.
Remove lamb from oven and rest for 10 minutes before slicing. Serve lamb with roast vegetables, parsley and lemon wedges.
